s_synopsis: CHAAARRGE!!! Strategy and skill are required for this unique game. Its numerous options will allow you to live the Civil War again. In the world of the comic book - Les Tuniques Bleues - you become a Yankee or Confederate. Encircle your enemy and launch surprise attacks. Selecting one or two players, move your troops, stop trains, take forts by assault and in the final part, lead a genuine little army on the field. To your sabres!
